description: The older Kodai brother and captain of Missile Ship 17, the Yukikaze. Mamoru sacrifices his life in the first episode to enable Okita`s stricken flagship to escape the battlefield, insisting he could not face the souls of his dead comrades if he fled. It is later revealed that his ship had crash-landed on Titan in one piece, and he had been captured alive by the Gamilas.
name: Kodai Mamoru
